backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining products, user profiles, locations, and admin/user‑authorized CRUD operations with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding and logo update requirements with affected frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of numerous frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global CSS variables, light/dark themes, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page title to QUICK-D and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration with public, protected, and admin routes and layout/guard components.
frontend/src/components/qd/AddressBook.t: Local address book component allowing users to add and select delivery addresses via a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/qd/AddToCartButt: UI button component that adds a product to the cart with toast feedback and temporary added state.
frontend/src/components/qd/AdminRouteGua: Guards admin-only routes by checking actor admin status and shows loading or access denied states.
frontend/src/components/qd/BannerCarouse: Displays an auto-advancing carousel of promotional banners with gradient backgrounds and images.
frontend/src/components/qd/CartItem.tsx: Renders a cart item with image, price, quantity controls, and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/qd/CouponInput.t: Handles coupon entry, validation, application, and removal with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/qd/EmptyState.ts: Shows an empty-state view with optional icon/image, description, and action button.
frontend/src/components/qd/ErrorState.ts: Displays an error alert with title, message, and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/qd/GradientShell: Wraps children in a full-screen gradient background container.
frontend/src/components/qd/LocationPicke: Allows users to detect, enter, and save latitude/longitude coordinates with geolocation support.
frontend/src/components/qd/Notifications: Shows a notifications bell button with an unread badge and navigates to notifications.
frontend/src/components/qd/OrderCard.tsx: Displays order summary info with status badge and a button to open order tracking.
frontend/src/components/qd/OrderTimeline: Visual timeline showing order progress with icons, completed states, and current status.
frontend/src/components/qd/PaymentMethod: Lets users select a payment method from preset options with visual selection state.
frontend/src/components/qd/PricingSummar: Calculates and displays subtotal, discount, delivery charge, tax, and final total.
frontend/src/components/qd/ProductCard.t: Displays a product card with image, pricing, discount, stock status, and add‑to‑cart button, navigating to the product page on click.
frontend/src/components/qd/ProfileSetupM: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/qd/SearchBarWith: Implements a search bar with debounced product suggestions and navigation to product or catalog pages.
frontend/src/components/qd/Skeletons.tsx: Provides skeleton placeholder components for product and order cards during loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/admin/useAdminProd: Contains mutations to add, update, and delete products through the actor API and invalidates product queries.
Defines sample product seed data and a mutation hook for seeding product data into the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/useLocation.ts: Fetches and mutates caller location data using actor methods and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/useNotifications.t: Returns a periodically‑polled mock notifications list using react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/usePolling.ts: Custom hook for running a callback repeatedly on a set interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/useProducts.ts: Provides queries for fetching all products, a product by ID, or products by category via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/useServiceAvailabi: Checks service availability based on the user's saved location using actor.isServiceAvailable.
frontend/src/hooks/qd/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile, updating related queries on mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping AuthClient setup, login handling, and identity state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables, gradients, animations, and utility classes for the app's UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessDeni: Displays an access denied message for unauthorized admin users with a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Placeholder page showing that category management is pending backend support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCoupons.ts: Loads and displays seeded coupon codes with badges and descriptions.
Static admin dashboard showing placeholder metrics for users, orders, and revenue.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin panel layout with sidebar navigation and routed main content area.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrders.tsx: Placeholder page indicating order management will be implemented later.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProducts.t: Admin interface for listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with form dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSeed.tsx: Triggers seeding of sample data and displays status after initialization.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminServiceCon: Static display of current store location and delivery radius with note to modify backend for changes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUsers.tsx: Placeholder page for future user management features.
frontend/src/pages/Auth.tsx: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity, redirecting authenticated users and showing feature highlights and login status.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with item list, coupon input, pricing summary, and an empty state; allows navigation to checkout or catalog.
frontend/src/pages/Catalog.tsx: Shows products filtered by category or search query, using product hooks and rendering cards or skeletons based on loading state.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Handles address selection, payment method choice, order validation, and simulated order placement with navigation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Docs.tsx: Displays documentation sections for development, configuration, and deployment using cards with code snippets.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage showing search, banners, categories, and product lists with navigation and cart integration.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Notifications page showing an empty state when no alerts are available.
frontend/src/pages/Orders.tsx: Lists past orders or shows an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/OrderSuccess.tsx: Order confirmation page displaying success details and navigation to tracking or home.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTracking.tsx: Shows tracking details for an order, including status timeline and estimated delivery.
frontend/src/pages/OutOfRadius.tsx: Informs users they are outside the delivery area and provides options to update location or return home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Displays detailed product info with pricing, stock, images, discount badges, and add-to-cart options.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page showing user info, location settings, links to orders/docs, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Splash.tsx: Splash screen that waits for identity initialization, then navigates to home or auth after a delay.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items, updates, removal, persistence, and total calculation.
frontend/src/state/coupons.ts: Zustand store for coupon seeding, application, removal, and discount calculation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind setup extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing QUICK-D’s architecture, features, branding updates, and development requirements.
